title: First steps to sharemarket investment
brief_description: This video is aimed, primarily, at those people interested in making their first move into the world of investment. In it, Susan Manson, B.Ec., Education Officer for the Australian Stock Exchange, Melbourne, takes you step by step through all the aspects of equity investments. In short, everything you ever wanted to know to become a knowledgeable participant in the market.
